amendment.description: Amendment increases the Part B set-aside funding cap to $750,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 108-79 strikes the current Part B set=aside funds of $500,000 and replace it with $750,000. Strikes the parenthetical provision that references the inflationary adjustment, in order to provide more opportunity for administrative growth in small states.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bradley (NH) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
